page.title: 11My Sunday in Huntley
page.content: On Sunday I arose at 8.00am.and had my breakfast.I had Cornflakes with milk followed by toast. Luke called for me at 9.30am.and we went down to Luke's house to play. When we had finished playing,Luke and I went to Solomons Tump to look at all the houses. We went back to Luke's house to have a game of Badminton until lunchtime. Later on,Luke and I played in a willow tree.Suddenly Luke fell out of the tree. He said his leg was hurting.We went to Luke's house so his mum could have a look at his leg.I played until 9.00pm. and I went to bed at 9.30pm.
